name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
1. orientation and test on winter reading 
2. reading on paparazzi 
3. reading on paparazzi (II) 
4. Private lives 
5. private lives (conti.)
6. out to lunch 
7. out to lunch (con.t) 
8. review 
9. midterm exam 
10. writing practice 
11. intensive reading on music
12. reading skills and text analysis 
13. commom mistakes on grammatical usage
14. intensive reading on ethnic culture 
15. development of language skills 
16. review 
17.final exam 
18. proficiency test

midterm exam  30%
